kaluthara - ethanamandala pradeshayedi bandhanagara bas rathayakata pahara di pathala nayaka samayan athulu hath denaku samulaghathanaya kirima, piliyandala pradeshayedi polis mathdrawya nashaka karyanshaye niladharin ilakka kara ganimin sannaddha praharayak ella kara manushya ghathanayak sidukirima, aadi aparadhayan rasak salasum kirime chodanawan sambandhayen aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa sakas kala warthawata anuwa samarasinha aarachchige madush lakshitha nohoth makandure madushta jathyanthara polisiya nil niwedanayak nikuth kara atha.

ee ayage darshanaya kihipayak asabhya aakarayen antharajalayata muda harimath samangin.thamanta muhuna pannata siduwu mema akarathabbaya gana dulani awastha kihipayakadima prathichara dakwa thibunu athara, dulani aayema wathawak ese antharajalaya wetha mudaharunu thamange ranganayak athulath asabhya darshana walata mulumaninma wagakiwa yuththe thaman samanga ekata wada kala pirisa bawayi.

mahanuwara maha rohalata paminena 15,000ka pamana wu mahajanathawa wisin dinakata kilo gram 5,000ka pamana polithin ha plastik pramanayak bahara karana bawath ema kasala hethuwen pasugiya wasaredi pamanak 35 wathawak rohale apaharana paddhathiya yatha thaththwayata path kirimata siduwu bawath ki rohal adhyakshakawaraya ee sandaha rupiyal laksha 35k pamana wayawu bawada kiyasitiyeya.
mema adhikshanaye di wisheshayen shri lanka rajaya wisin aparanumathiya laba di athi eksath jathinge wishesha pragnyapthin 3k kerehi yuropa sangamaye wishesha awadhanaya yomu kare.
